This is a collection of links that lead to projects that I have made for my Geography 176A class, a class GIS course based in the R coding language, for the Summer 2020 quarter. 

## [Building a project website]()

-- In this assignment, we learned how to create a static users site with GitHub pages. 
-- We learned how to add information into markdown files, including images, text, and headers.
-- We learned how to customize our site with Bootstrap themes and other features. 
-- We learned how to add icons to navbar links.
